title: On-Chain Data Analysis
description: Learn blockchain data analysis from scratch and become an on-chain data analyst

questions.title: Which connection method can be used to extract matching rows from two tables?
Which of the following is not an aggregation function in SQL?
Which keyword allows us to find unique values in a data table?
Which SQL statement is used to retrieve data from a database?
Using SQL, how do you select the column 'FirstName' from the table named 'Persons'?
Using SQL, how do you select all records from the table 'Persons' where the value of the column 'FirstName' is 'Peter'?
options: SELECT [all] FROM Persons WHERE FirstName LIKE 'Peter'

questions.title: The OR operator displays a record if any of the listed conditions is true. The AND operator displays a record if all of the listed conditions are true.
Which SQL keyword is used to sort the result set?
Using SQL, how do you return the number of records in the 'Persons' table?
Which of the following statements about UNION is correct?
options: The order of columns cannot be the same in each SELECT statement
The columns must have similar data types
In UNION, each SELECT statement does not have to have the same number of columns
The UNION ALL operator selects distinct values by default

questions.title: Which of the following statements about UNION is correct?
options: UNION is faster than UNION ALL
UNION and UNION ALL are calculated simultaneously
UNION ALL is faster than regular UNION

questions.title: What is the SQL keyword related to grouping and summing?
Which of the following is an incorrect description of CTE?
options: CTE stands for Common Table Expression
Defined CTE can be referenced multiple times in the same SQL statement
Using CTE instead of multiple subqueries can improve query efficiency

questions.title: Which function can be used when you need to concatenate different types of fields as strings?
When you need to associate one dataset with another table to retrieve a field value, but in some cases, there may not be data that meets the conditions. What type of join should be used in this case?
Which statement about the data tables in Dune is correct?
options: Tables with the name '_evt_' are event log tables
Tables with the name '_call_' are method call tables
Event log tables and method call tables are collectively referred to as parsed data tables

questions.title: Which statement about Dune's magic tables (Spells) is incorrect?
options: Anyone can participate in building and contributing to magic tables
Magic tables are all created by the Dune core team
Magic tables are jointly built by the Dune core team and Dune community users
Magic tables may essentially be views or tables

questions.title: Which statement about contract parsing tables in Dune is correct?
options: Any user can submit smart contract parsing
Only the deployer of the smart contract can submit parsing
Only employees of Dune can submit smart contract parsing
Only paid member users can submit smart contract parsing

questions.title: To accurately calculate the ETH token balance of a user on the Ethereum chain, which table must be used for statistical calculation?
If a smart contract has not been parsed by Dune, which statement is correct?
options: The data of the smart contract cannot be analyzed on Dune
Contract method call data can be directly parsed from the Logs table
Contract method call and event log data can be directly parsed from the Logs table
Contract event log data can be directly parsed from the Logs table
